SELECT last(CavityPressure) AS CavityPressure FROM autogen.crds WHERE ('CavityPressure' =~ /^$species$/ AND valve_pos =~ /^$ports$/ AND analyzer =~ /^$instrument$/ AND valve_stable_time < $stabilization_time) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last(CavityPressure) AS CavityPressure FROM autogen.crds WHERE ('CavityPressure' =~ /^$species$/ AND valve_pos = '0' AND analyzer =~ /^$instrument$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last(CavityTemp) AS CavityTemp FROM autogen.crds WHERE ('CavityTemp' =~ /^$species$/ AND valve_pos =~ /^$ports$/ AND analyzer =~ /^$instrument$/ AND valve_stable_time > $stabilization_time) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last(CavityTemp) AS CavityTemp FROM autogen.crds WHERE ('CavityTemp' =~ /^$species$/ AND valve_pos =~ /^$ports$/ AND analyzer =~ /^$instrument$/ AND valve_stable_time < $stabilization_time) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last(CavityTemp) AS CavityTemp FROM autogen.crds WHERE ('CavityTemp' =~ /^$species$/ AND valve_pos = '0' AND analyzer =~ /^$instrument$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last(port) AS Port FROM autogen.crds WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
